summary: Iteration 15 - Frontend UI testing of calendar cards and booking modal. All 4 features verified working: Web Calendar Day View, Web Calendar Week View, Booking Modal compact design, and Dashboard Schedule.
passed_tests: Web Calendar Day View - HOUR_HEIGHT=90 provides adequate space for booking cards
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards show time (11:00) in colored text
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards show team member avatar (small circle with initial)
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards show client name 'Test Client Premium' - NOT CUT OFF
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards show service name 'Haircut & Style' - NOT CUT OFF
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards have colored left border accent (teal)
Web Calendar Day View - Booking cards have white background with subtle border
Web Calendar Day View - Team member columns have avatars at top with colored bars
Web Calendar Week View - Booking cards have colored left border accent
Web Calendar Week View - Cards show time, client name, service clearly
Web Calendar Week View - Cards are draggable for rescheduling
Web Calendar Week View - '+4 more' link for overflow bookings
Booking Modal - Compact design with max-h-[85vh]
Booking Modal - Continue button visible at bottom (y=692px, within 844px viewport)
Booking Modal - Fixed footer with total price £38.50 (incl. tax)
Booking Modal - Scrollable content area for calendar and time slots
Booking Modal - Morning/Afternoon/Evening time period tabs
Booking Modal - Time slots displayed correctly (9:00 AM, 9:15 AM, etc.)
Booking Modal - Continue button closes modal and shows 'Your Details' form
Dashboard Schedule - Time displayed clearly (09:30 in teal)
Dashboard Schedule - Client names visible (David James, Ibby) - NOT CUT OFF
Dashboard Schedule - Service names visible (Hair Color, Haircut & Style, etc.) - NOT CUT OFF
Dashboard Schedule - Status badges (completed, confirmed) shown correctly
critical_code_review_comments: HOUR_HEIGHT correctly set to 90 in CalendarPage.jsx (line 48)
Minimum card height of 48px enforced in getBookingPosition (line 90)
Booking modal uses max-h-[85vh] for compact design (PublicBookingPage.jsx line 281)
Fixed footer with flex-shrink-0 ensures Continue button stays visible
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 15 features verified working: 1) Web Calendar Day View shows premium Fresha-style booking cards with colored left border accent, team avatar, client name, service name - all visible without cutoff. HOUR_HEIGHT=90 provides adequate space. 2) Web Calendar Week View shows cards with colored left border, time, client name, service. 3) Booking Modal at /book/{businessId} is compact (85vh max), Continue button visible at y=692px within 844px mobile viewport, total £38.50 shown in fixed footer. 4) Dashboard Schedule shows time, client name, service clearly. Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123.

booking_cards.style: White background, colored left border accent, subtle border
booking_cards.content: Time (colored), team avatar, client name, service name

web_calendar_day_view.team_columns: Avatars with colored top bars, names and roles displayed

booking_cards.style: Colored left border accent, white background

booking_modal.scrollable_content: Calendar and time slots in scrollable area

dashboard_schedule.client_names: David James, Ibby - NOT CUT OFF
dashboard_schedule.service_names: Hair Color, Haircut & Style, Beard Trim, Deep Conditioning - NOT CUT OFF
